    33	
    34	def recenter(x, mean=None):
    35	    x = torch.Tensor(x).cuda()
    36	    if mean is None:
    37	        mean = torch.mean(x,axis=0,keepdims=True).cuda()
    38	    else:
    39	        mean = torch.Tensor(mean).cuda()
    40	    return x - mean
    41	
    42	def project_onto_direction(H, direction):
    43	    """Project matrix H (n, d_1) onto direction vector (d_2,)"""
    44	    # Calculate the magnitude of the direction vector
    45	     # Ensure H and direction are on the same device (CPU or GPU)
    46	    if type(direction) != torch.Tensor:
    47	        H = torch.Tensor(H).cuda()
    48	    if type(direction) != torch.Tensor:
    49	        direction = torch.Tensor(direction)
    50	        direction = direction.to(H.device)
    51	    mag = torch.norm(direction)
    52	    assert not torch.isinf(mag).any()
    53	    # Calculate the projection
    54	    projection = H.matmul(direction) / mag
    55	    return projection
    56	
    57	# The following get_rep_directions_agent function is the key function used in repe reader, here you only need to implement the pca reader you can use the pca package to finish the function Please only edit the following two function to implement the repr reading method designed in the paper

    59	                             model,  # this parameter is unused in this function you can ignore this
    60	                             tokenizer,  # this parameter is unused in this function you can ignore this
    61	                             hidden_states,  # output hiddenstates of each layer which is a dict
    62	                             hidden_layers,  # target layer that we want to implement representation reader. Is a list of layer index you should use this to get the hiddenstates from hidden_states dict
    63	                             **kwargs):
    64	    """Get PCA components for each layer You can use the PCA package from sklearn which is already imported"""
    65	    """You can also use the recenter function which already defined above to recenter the hiddenstates"""
    66	    """This is a class function that have self.H_train_means[layer_index] aim to store the mean value of hiddenstates at each layer for calculating the PCA. and self.n_components is the number of component we use from PCA and this is the value you can directly use in this function."""
    67	    directions = {} # this is the dictionary you should return, this dictionary have the calculated pca component(first one component) for each layer's hiddenstate
    68	    raise NotImplementedError("The function 'get_rep_directions_agent' not implemented")
    69	    
    70	    return directions
